ğŸ‘‰ https://www.medstaffpremier.ca

---

## ğŸ“‹ Project Description

**MedStaff Premier** allows employers to post jobs for roles such as:

- Pharmacists
- Physicians
- Specialists
- Medical Administrators
- Clinical Assistants
- Pharmacy Assistants & Technicians

Candidates can browse jobs, upload resumes, and apply directly. Employers can unlock resumes upon payment.

## âœ¨ Key Features

- ğŸ” **Admin & Candidate Authentication**
- ğŸ“ **Smart Apply Modal** with resume upload
- ğŸ’¼ **Post Jobs with Square Payment Integration**
- ğŸ“‚ **Resume Manager** (for candidates)
- ğŸ“Š **Admin Dashboard** with:
  - Candidate filtering & categorization
  - CSV export
  - Resume preview
  - Delete & manage applications
- ğŸ“¬ **Email notifications** via Resend & Supabase Edge Functions
- ğŸ“± **Mobile-friendly** design
- âš™ï¸ **Fully integrated with Supabase** (auth, storage, database)
- ğŸ“¦ **PWA support** for offline access

---

## ğŸ§± Tech Stack

- **Frontend**: React + TypeScript + Vite
- **Backend/DB**: Supabase (PostgreSQL, Auth, Storage)
- **Payments**: Square
- **Emails**: Resend (via Supabase Edge Functions)
- **Deployment**: Vercel / Netlify
- **PWA**: Vite Plugin PWA
